Description.Text: Situated in Istanbul`s Sultanahmet neighborhood, Mystic Hotel is close to Turkish and Islamic Art Museum, Hippodrome, and Blue Mosque. Also nearby are Grand Bazaar and Basilica Cistern. The 13 air-conditioned guestrooms at Mystic Hotel include minibars and hair dryers. Guests can channel-surf the cable television. All accommodations provide desks and direct-dial phones. Rooms have wireless Internet access. Additional amenities include a safe deposit box at the front desk and air conditioning in public areas. The front desk is open 24 hours a day.
